name: Sprint3Final
description: An updated version of the second sprint.  Updates were made to change other attributes of the primitive objects such as the primitive's opacity, and how long before each primitive will destroy itself. A clock with a live readout of the time was also created, in addition to the functionality of switching between the time in the AM or the PM, and the lighting of the scene will reflect this change.  Additionally, new animations were created to show and hide the UI, and the glow feature was fixed as well.
